reviews.name: BRIGGS & STRATTON 030552 Portable Generator, Rated Watts7500, 420cc
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because local power failures are getting longer in my area
reviews.title: Reliable

reviews.name: BRIGGS & STRATTON 030552 Portable Generator, Rated Watts7500, 420cc
reviews.reviewText: I bought this generator during the Sandy outage on the East Coast (Northern NJ). It's now in a housing that I open for use, with a 240v. cable to a transfer switch to give me heat, refrigeration, and communications. Just last week, after making it through weeks of snow storms without any power loss, a substation failed on a cloudless, windless, but cold day, and I returned home to start dinner for my child to find no power. One pull, setting a couple circuits on the transfer switch, and dinner was cooking while my daughter used the computer. I run it every couple of weeks for 20-30 minutes, and keep it gassed with preservative, but it's given us a lot of piece of mind, never mind heat, light, and entertainment when the rest of the block is dark. Best emergency purchase I've made.
reviews.title: Reliable

reviews.name: BRIGGS & STRATTON 030552 Portable Generator, Rated Watts7500, 420cc
reviews.reviewText: Bought a year ago. Had electrician wire for whole house use directly into the fuse panel through a manual master switch. Used once besides testing and it worked great. No problems.
reviews.title: Electric Start

reviews.name: BRIGGS & STRATTON 030552 Portable Generator, Rated Watts7500, 420cc
reviews.reviewText: I hav been searching for this size/capacity generator for quite sometime. Quality and dependability were defining factors of this choice but I was pleasantly suprised that the unit was available for an excellent price as well.
reviews.title: Excellent machine!
